titles.title: A resolution recognizing February 20, 2008, as the 100th anniversary of Abraham Baldwin Agricultural College.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 2/13/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes: (1) the 100th anniversary of Abraham Baldwin Agricultural College for its contributions to the community and to higher education in Georgia; and (2) the achievements of its administration, faculty, students, and staff.
